div.class: row py-3 py-sm-2 py-md-3 py-lg-3 no-gutters align-items-center
col-4 col-sm-8 col-md-4 col-lg-4 pl-2 pl-md-0 pl-lg-0 bg-warning2
col-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-lg-12 col-xl-6 left main--col-1
col-12 6 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-lg-12 col-xl-6 right main--col-2
col-12 col-sm-12 col-md-6 col-md-12 col-lg-12 col-xl-6 right--upper-left div-1
col-12 col-sm-12 col-md-6 col-md-12 col-lg-12 col-xl-6 right--upper-right div-2
col-12 col-sm-12 col-md-6 col-md-12 col-lg-12 col-xl-6 right--lower-left div-1
col-12 col-sm-12 col-md-6 col-md-12 col-lg-12 col-xl-6 right--lower-right div-2

div.div:
Response rate: Normal
Response time: within an hour

t.p: Booking in process, if not confirm order will cancel in Minutes

t.h5: It's not allow to booking from host account

t.t-elif: product.rp_host and pt and product.rp_host.id == pt.id
t.h5: You can't book your own product

input.t-att-value: kw.get('childs', product.rp_childs if not product.rp_childs == 0 else '0')
input.name: children

div.div: Please go to home page to explore all services of AvailablityShare
